meanings.sent1: She overpedaled on her bike and got tired quickly.
meanings.sent2: He overpedaled during the race and couldn't keep up with the others.
meanings.sent3: The little girl overpedaled on her tricycle, causing her to fall over in the grass.
meanings.sent4: His enthusiasm for cycling overpedaled his actual physical ability.
meanings.sent5: The image of him overpedaling up the steep hill stuck in her mind.

meanings.definition: To have used a pedal excessively
meanings.sent1: The guitarist overpedaled on the distortion pedal, making the sound too harsh.
meanings.sent2: She overpedaled on the sewing machine, causing the thread to break.
meanings.sent3: He comically overpedaled on the gas pedal, making the car lurch forward.
meanings.sent4: The chef overpedaled on the salt, making the soup too salty to eat.
meanings.sent5: The artist overpedaled on the paint, creating a thick, messy layer on the canvas.
